alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 29 at 4:36PM AKST until February 01 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Near Haines. * WHEN...Until 1215 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Ponding of water in areas is occurring or is imminent. Small slides have been reported. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 PM AKST, emergency management reported an area of heavy rainfall across the advisory area. Rapid snowmelt is also occurring and will combine with rain to cause minor flooding. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are possible. - Saturated ground and strong winds may cause tree fall. - Airport Road is under water. - Storm drains should be kept clear of debris as much as possible.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
